閏.definition: intercalary; an extra day or month inserted into the lunar or solar calendar (such as February 29)

閏四月，吃樹葉.pinyin: run4 si4 yue4 , chi1 shu4 ye4
閏四月，吃樹葉.definition: an intercalary fourth month brings food shortages

閏年.definition: leap year; (lunar calendar) year with a thirteen intercalary month

閏月.definition: intercalary month in the lunar calendar; leap month
